name: Caspio Mobile App - Group 2: Critical Mobile Fixes
completionCriteria: Mark complete when code edits are done - do not wait for testing

userStories.title: Multi-Image Upload - One Image Stuck in Queue Forever (MOBILE ONLY)
userStories.description: CRITICAL: When adding multiple photos in Structural Systems (mobile app), 1 image remains stuck in queue forever. Clicking Sync shows 'uploading' briefly then back to queue. The FIRST image listed in the queue is typically the one that gets stuck. This ONLY happens on mobile app - webapp works perfectly fine with multiple images.
acceptanceCriteria: All images in multi-image upload sync successfully on mobile
No images get stuck in queue permanently
First image in queue syncs correctly
Force sync clears all queued items
Works with 3, 4, 5+ images on mobile app
Behavior matches webapp (which works correctly)
investigationSteps: Compare mobile vs webapp upload flow - what's different?
Check if mobile has different batch size limits
Look for race conditions in mobile-specific code paths
Check LocalImage outbox processing on mobile
Verify upload worker doesn't skip first item on mobile
Check for mobile-specific network/blob handling differences
Focus on why the FIRST image gets stuck specifically

userStories.title: Random Hard Refreshes Throughout App - Critical Stability Issue
userStories.description: CRITICAL: The mobile app hard refreshes randomly and consistently, making it feel completely broken. Triggers include: clicking sync modal, clicking image, saving annotation, after sync completes, entering category/room. This is happening randomly and consistently. DO NOT assume this has been fixed previously - it is still happening. Spend as much time as needed. Run as many tests as needed. Find the root cause: Is it local data saving? Broken data? Memory issue? State corruption?
acceptanceCriteria: No hard refreshes when clicking sync modal
No hard refreshes when clicking images
No hard refreshes when saving annotations
No hard refreshes after sync completes
No hard refreshes when navigating to categories/rooms
App remains stable during all normal operations
Root cause identified and permanently resolved
investigationAreas: Check for unhandled exceptions that trigger page reload
Look for state corruption causing Angular to force reload
Check IndexedDB errors that might crash change detection
Look for memory leaks causing app to restart
Check for infinite loops in liveQuery subscriptions
Verify change detection doesn't trigger recursive reloads
Check for broken data structures causing errors
Add global error handler to catch and log before refresh happens
Check window.location assignments or navigation.reload() calls
Look for Zone.js errors causing full app reload

userStories.title: Optimize Structural Categories and Rooms Page Load Speed
userStories.description: Loading of structural categories pages shows loading screen and takes too long to load. Rooms also take a bit of time to load. Need to optimize page loading while maintaining 100% of current functionality. Do NOT lose any functionality - same features must work exactly as before, just faster.
acceptanceCriteria: Structural category pages load faster
Rooms load faster
ALL images still display correctly - no disappearance
ALL photos still show up - no missing images
Lazy loading still works
Captions persist correctly
Annotations persist correctly
Zero functionality regression
safeOptimizationStrategies: Profile to find actual bottlenecks (don't guess)
Use virtual scrolling for long lists if applicable
safetyConstraints: DO NOT break image display logic
DO NOT change LocalImages loading flow in ways that break display
DO NOT modify lazy loading logic in ways that break it
If optimization risks stability - DON'T DO IT
